translations: 播种（sow 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Be sure to do the sowing in good time.
There is a view that modern humans are inevitably sowing the seeds of a global Grand Banks-style disaster.
sentences.translation: 有一种观点认为，现代人类不可避免地会播下全球大浅滩式灾难的种子。

sentences.sentence: Nowadays, people use the phrase "waiting for rabbits by a tree stump" to describe those who just wait and dream of reaping (收获) without sowing.
sentences.translation: 如今，人们用成语“守株待兔”来形容那些一味等待、幻想收割却又从不播种的人。
